item.title: Need help adjusting homepage on forums
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Bubbsy7:

I don’t see anywhere where you can edit the homepage on forums, My idea is to create server announcements daily and post them on the homepage

For that you’ll need to use some simple PHP and the SMF SSI. At the top of your homepage include the following:

include('/pathtoyourforumsdirectory/SSI.php');

Then wherever you want to call your announcements you can make use of the ssi_boardNews(); function that the SSI supplies. The layout is as follows -
ssi_boardNews([BOARDID],[NUMTODISPLAY],[POSTTOSTARTON],[CHARLIMIT],[OUTPUTMETHOD]);

For example

ssi_boardNews(1, 2, 0, 300);

Would then display the topics from board number 1, the 2 most recent topics, no post to start on and a 300 character limit.

I’m assuming you’re using SMF since that’s what you were using earlier.
